description:
Our apartment in a recently built Bushwick condo is ideal to explore this new trendy neighborhood as well as reaching Williamsburg and Downtown Manhattan in a 20mins subway ride.
We are close to hotspots like Nowadays, Father Knows Best, Roberta's and the Jefferson st area. Our place features modern conveniences and access to the a roof terrace with a view of Manhattan. Great for couples, business travelers or families and groups up to six people.
name: Bushwick designer home
